description:
After Koharun and Aoi choose the anime pattern in which time doesn`t actually pass, they`re rejoined by Yua and Hiina, and the Tesaguri Club is back in session. The members discuss whether they get to keep their memories from the first season. In the clubroom, they think of a new high school basketball team, but Yua announces that since this Encore season was suddenly decided on, the animators didn`t have enough time to work on these early episodes, so advises the rest of the members to be still as much as possible. That doesn`t stop Aoi from performing her trademark unconventional moves, though...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Faith to Withstand Every Trial
あらゆる試練に耐えた誠実
